comment: "Initially offered $100, raised to $200 when I asked"

relationship: Submission/spec (piece was written prior and then submitted for publication)

comment:
"The Toast gave me $25 for a 1100 word piece in 3/14, they had previously given me $50 for a 1500 word post in 2/14- I'm not really sure why the amounts were vastly different.

They were both pieces that required lots of historical research"
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "$50 for 3000 words. Communication with publisher and editors was smooth however, and the site had only recently started gaining traffic-- suspect that's why payment was so low. Although a personal essay, it was interwoven with a lot of legal fact checking."
"The Toast seems to have no pay schedule. Always have to email publisher multiple times to receive pay promised by editors. Still haven't been paid for this piece. "
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "Had to give up rights, but apparently they're good about giving back rights if you request them. Took a while to get paid, had to send several follow-up emails."

relationship: Submission/spec (piece was written prior and then submitted for publication)

comment:
"I believe they are lowering their rates though, maybe to $50.
I haven't received payment yet but, then again, it's only been a couple of weeks"
